label: Docking
description: Perform molecular docking for ligands and proteins.

defaultInputs.name: Compound List
defaultInputs.tooltip: Ligand list including identifiers and file paths for each compound.

defaultInputs.name: Protein Target List
defaultInputs.tooltip: Protein targets with prepared structures and optional grid definitions.

defaultOutputs.name: Docked Structure
defaultOutputs.tooltip: 3D structure file (PDB format) of the docked compound-target complex.

defaultOutputs.name: ΔG (kcal/mol)
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Predicted binding free energy in kcal/mol. More negative values indicate stronger binding affinity (e.g. "-6.3", "-9.2").

configSchema.label: SMILES
configSchema.tooltip: Smiles strings of the compounds to be docked

configSchema.label: Protein 3D structure
configSchema.tooltip: 3D structure of the proteins to be docked

configSchema.label: Docking Engine
configSchema.tooltip:
Select a docking backend:
- **AutoDock Vina** – accurate classical docking.
- **DiffDock** – fast ML‑based pose prediction.
- **SwissDock** – convenient web‑style presets for quick exploration.

configSchema.label: Vina Exhaustiveness (Simple)
configSchema.description: Simple setting for **AutoDock Vina** controlling search thoroughness. Higher values increase accuracy but take longer.

configSchema.label: Vina Number of Binding Modes (Advanced)
configSchema.placeholder: Number of binding poses to generate
configSchema.tooltip: Advanced: number of binding poses Vina should generate per ligand.

configSchema.label: Grid Box Definition (Advanced)
configSchema.tooltip: Advanced: JSON definition of the docking search box centre and dimensions (Å).

configSchema.label: DiffDock Samples (Simple)
configSchema.description: Simple setting for **DiffDock** controlling how many poses are sampled per complex. More samples = better coverage but slower.

configSchema.label: DiffDock Confidence Threshold (Advanced)
configSchema.tooltip: Advanced: minimum DiffDock confidence score to keep a predicted pose.

configSchema.label: SwissDock Run Type (Simple)
configSchema.description: Simple preset selector for **SwissDock** controlling the trade-off between speed and accuracy.

configSchema.label: SwissDock Advanced Precision
configSchema.tooltip: Advanced: switch between standard and fine‑grid scoring for SwissDock.
